Name: NCA oxide production, for Li-ion battery | NCA oxide | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: NCA oxide is produced through a multi-step calcination process. NCA hydroxide and lithium hydroxide are mixed and heated in the calcination kiln over two or three rounds of mixing and calcination. Oxygen is also add to the mixture.The resulting material is crushed, sieved and demagnetized to obtain NCA oxide. The production process is completely automated and almost all electricity consumption is attributed to the calcination kiln.
